description:
Good morning!

Can this website link please be added to this drop down menu? I struggle with including new options under the drop downs - you can do it in a flash. ?

Text should be: Peer Careers Illinois with a link to the site below.

From the drop down menu under Resources on the https://namiillinois.org/ homepage.

https://peercareersil.org/

Thank you!


----

Darcie R. Shinberger (she/her/hers)
Communications Manager*

(217) 522-1403 Ext. 3

www.namiillinois.org<http://www.namiillinois.org/>

*Available: 7 a.m.-12:30 p.m., Monday-Thursday {Note: To arrange a meeting outside of these posted working hours, please email to inquire about a day/time. Thank you!}


[cid:81d6b1fd-42cb-4b34-bc43-db96b989a3d8]

In 1984, NAMI Illinois was formed by a coalition of local mental health advocates, including many of the 19 NAMI in Illinois affiliates. NAMI Illinois exists to support our affiliates, create avenues for grassroots leadership, and foster connections that bring NAMI hope to all of Illinois.
subject: Addition to drop down menu
description_html:
Good morning!

Can this website link please be added to this drop down menu? I struggle with including new options under the drop downs - you can do it in a flash. 🙂

Text should be: Peer Careers Illinois with a link to the site below. 

From the drop down menu under Resources on the https://namiillinois.org/ homepage.

https://peercareersil.org/

Thank you!

----
Darcie R. Shinberger (she/her/hers)
Communications Manager*
(217) 522-1403 Ext. 3 
www.namiillinois.org    
*Available: 7 a.m.-12:30 p.m., Monday-Thursday {Note: To arrange a meeting outside of these posted working hours, please email to inquire about a day/time. Thank you!}

In 1984, NAMI Illinois was formed by a coalition of local mental health advocates, including many of the 19 NAMI in Illinois affiliates. NAMI Illinois exists to support our affiliates, create avenues for grassroots leadership, and foster connections that bring NAMI hope to all of Illinois.

description:
I still cant use my email. Can you use this account for now because I know it works.

I STILL cant access my email. Did you make all these changes?

Thanks,



> Begin forwarded message:
> 
> From: Cecilia E <support@mail.support.microsoft.com>
> Subject: Unable to send and receive emails - TrackingID#2410290040013428
> Date: October 29, 2024 at 12:20:22 PM PDT
> To: "brenda@namimsj.org" <brenda@namimsj.org>
> Cc: "namihemet@gmail.com" <namihemet@gmail.com>
> 
> Hello Brenda,
>  
> Thank you for your confirmation to close the ticket as resolved. Below is a quick summary of the resolution for your reference:   
>  
> What we did to help: We observed that you want to access your business account using the email address "brenda@namimsj.org," which is associated with Exchange through your Apple Mail app. We provided you with the information you need to use Outlook instead of the Apple Mail app to send and receive emails on time. You can use Outlook on your desktop or access the web version by navigating to outlook.live.com. Additionally, we ran diagnostics on our end to check for any incorrect DNS records with your DNS host provider, Cloudflare. We found that your SPF records are incorrect, and your DMARC and DKIM configurations are not yet set up. 
>  
> Please provide the DNS records below to Cloudflare so they can be correctly configured on their end.
>  
> Step 1 - Set-up your TXT records correctly. 
> Type: TXT 
> Value: v=spf1 include:spf.protection.outlook.com -all
> TTL: 3600 or 1 hour 
>   
> Step 2 - Set-up your CNAME records.   
> Type: CNAME 
> Hostname: selector1._domainkey.namimsj.org
> Value/Points to address: selector1-namimsj-org._domainkey.NETORG78345.onmicrosoft.com
> TTL: 3600 or 1 hour 
>   
> Type: CNAME 
> Hostname: selector2._domainkey.namimsj.org
> Value/Points to address: selector2-namimsj-org._domainkey.NETORG78345.onmicrosoft.com
> TTL: 3600 or 1 hour 
>  
> Step 3 - Set-up your DMARC records. 
> Type: TXT 
> Hostname: _dmarc.namimsj.org
> Value: v=DMARC1; p=quarantine; pct=100; rua=mailto:admin@namimsj.org
> TTL: 3600 or 1 hour 
>   
> Note: Adding DNS records has a propagation time of at least 1 hour to 24 hours, depending on your DNS host provider, to fully take effect. 
>  
> Reference Article/s: 
> www.cloudflare.com <https://www.cloudflare.com/plans/enterprise/contact/>
> www.whois.com <https://www.whois.com/>
>  
> Additionally, we wanted to bring to your attention the benefits of integrating Microsoft 365 Copilot into your workflows. Microsoft 365 Copilot is an AI-powered assistant that integrates seamlessly with your existing tools to enhance productivity and collaboration. If you are interested, you may check the reference article below: 
> Reference: Microsoft 365 Copilot—Business Plans | Microsoft 365 <https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/microsoft-365/copilot/business/> 
>  
> Brenda, your feedback matters! We love listening to your feedback, and we use it to reinforce your positive experiences, and any written comments are greatly appreciated. In case you've missed answering the survey over the phone, you may answer it using the link below: https://admin.microsoft.com/adminportal/home#/support/feedback/24102900400013428
>  
> If you have already answered the survey, we say, thank you!  
>  
> It has been my absolute pleasure to assist you! Should you need help again in the future, you can always reach us back and we will be happy to assist.   
>  
>  
> Best Regards,
> Cecil
> Microsoft 365 Support Ambassador 
> Working hours: 
> Eastern Time: Monday-Friday | 8:00AM-4:00PM EST 
￼
> http://support.office.com <http://support.office.com/>    
> Please visit the New Microsoft 365 offerings for small and medium-sized businesses page <https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2120533> to find out more about our rebranding from Office 365 to Microsoft365.  
> One Microsoft Way, Redmond, WA 98052 USA | Privacy Statement <http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=248681>
subject: Fwd: Unable to send and receive emails - TrackingID#2410290040013428
description_html:
I still cant use my email. Can you use this account for now because I know it works.

I STILL cant access my email. Did you make all these changes?

Thanks,



Begin forwarded message:

From: Cecilia E <support@mail.support.microsoft.com>
Subject: Unable to send and receive emails - TrackingID#2410290040013428
Date: October 29, 2024 at 12:20:22 PM PDT
To: "brenda@namimsj.org" <brenda@namimsj.org>
Cc: "namihemet@gmail.com" <namihemet@gmail.com>

Hello Brenda,
 
Thank you for your confirmation to close the ticket as resolved. Below is a quick summary of the resolution for your reference:   
 
What we did to help: We observed that you want to access your business account using the email address "brenda@namimsj.org," which is associated with Exchange through your Apple Mail app. We provided you with the information you need to use Outlook instead of the Apple Mail app to send and receive emails on time. You can use Outlook on your desktop or access the web version by navigating to outlook.live.com. Additionally, we ran diagnostics on our end to check for any incorrect DNS records with your DNS host provider, Cloudflare. We found that your SPF records are incorrect, and your DMARC and DKIM configurations are not yet set up. 
 
Please provide the DNS records below to Cloudflare so they can be correctly configured on their end.
 
Step 1 - Set-up your TXT records correctly. 
Type: TXT 
Value: v=spf1 include:spf.protection.outlook.com -all
TTL: 3600 or 1 hour 
  
Step 2 - Set-up your CNAME records.   
Type: CNAME 
Hostname: selector1._domainkey.namimsj.org
Value/Points to address: selector1-namimsj-org._domainkey.NETORG78345.onmicrosoft.com
TTL: 3600 or 1 hour 
  
Type: CNAME 
Hostname: selector2._domainkey.namimsj.org
Value/Points to address: selector2-namimsj-org._domainkey.NETORG78345.onmicrosoft.com
TTL: 3600 or 1 hour 
 
Step 3 - Set-up your DMARC records. 
Type: TXT 
Hostname: _dmarc.namimsj.org
Value: v=DMARC1; p=quarantine; pct=100; rua=mailto:admin@namimsj.org
TTL: 3600 or 1 hour 
  
Note: Adding DNS records has a propagation time of at least 1 hour to 24 hours, depending on your DNS host provider, to fully take effect. 
 
Reference Article/s: 
www.cloudflare.com
www.whois.com
 
Additionally, we wanted to bring to your attention the benefits of integrating Microsoft 365 Copilot into your workflows. Microsoft 365 Copilot is an AI-powered assistant that integrates seamlessly with your existing tools to enhance productivity and collaboration. If you are interested, you may check the reference article below: 
Reference: Microsoft 365 Copilot—Business Plans | Microsoft 365 
 
Brenda, your feedback matters! We love listening to your feedback, and we use it to reinforce your positive experiences, and any written comments are greatly appreciated. In case you've missed answering the survey over the phone, you may answer it using the link below: https://admin.microsoft.com/adminportal/home#/support/feedback/24102900400013428
 
If you have already answered the survey, we say, thank you!  
 
It has been my absolute pleasure to assist you! Should you need help again in the future, you can always reach us back and we will be happy to assist.   
 
 
Best Regards,
Cecil
Microsoft 365 Support Ambassador 
Working hours: 
Eastern Time: Monday-Friday | 8:00AM-4:00PM EST 

http://support.office.com    
Please visit the New Microsoft 365 offerings for small and medium-sized businesses page to find out more about our rebranding from Office 365 to Microsoft365.  
One Microsoft Way, Redmond, WA 98052 USA | Privacy Statement

description:
Katie Jenkins, LMSW, MPA
she/her
Executive Director
NAMI Greater Cleveland
4415 Euclid Ave., Suite 203
Cleveland, Ohio 44103
Business: (216)875-0266
Helpline: (216)875-7776
Fax: (216)861-2574

www.namigreatercleveland.org<http://www.namigreatercleveland.org/>

[Facebook icon]<https://www.facebook.com/namigreatercleveland/> [LinkedIn icon] <https://www.linkedin.com/company/3321636/admin/>  [Twitter icon] <https://twitter.com/NAMIGRTCL>  [Instagram icon] <https://www.instagram.com/nami_gc/?hl=en>

NAMI Greater Cleveland has moved! You can find us at 4415 Euclid Avenue, Suite 203, Cleveland, Ohio 44103.  All phone numbers will remain the same.

From: Bloomerang Support <support@bloomerang.com>
Sent: Tuesday, October 29, 2024 2:30 PM
To: Katie Jenkins <kjenkins@namicleveland.org>
Subject: [EXTERNAL]RE: DKIM

Please be cautious
This email was sent outside of your organization. Use caution.
________________________________
Hello Katie,

Thank you for contacting Support! I hope you're doing well.

I'll be happy to help. Just take the following steps, and then let me know once they're completed. I can then verify them on my end, and give you the all-clear.

It looks like you're sending from the namigreatercleveland.org domain. I took a look, and it seems like your current spf record is the following:



v=spf1 a include:_spf.elasticemail.com ~all

You'll need to edit the spf record to include the following include statement:
include:sendgrid.net

It looks like your DNS is CloudFlare. You can find the guide to their DNS here: https://www.mail-tester.com/spf/cloudflare
Our overall guide to editing the SPF record can be found here: https://support.bloomerang.co/s/article/5000637586#Add_SPF

You can check if your SPF record is set up correctly or if it has errors here: https://mxtoolbox.com/SuperTool.aspx
Just type in your domain, then click the orange dropdown button and choose SPF record Lookup


Regarding DKIM, I have the CNAME records for you here. You'll want to use the following codes:

CNAME
HOST    em4859
VALUE    u44189260.wl011.sendgrid.net

CNAME
HOST    blm._domainkey
VALUE    blm.domainkey.u44189260.wl011.sendgrid.net

CNAME
HOST    blm2._domainkey
VALUE    blm2.domainkey.u44189260.wl011.sendgrid.net

If you're setting up dmarc as well, here is our default recommendation for the dmarc records:

TXT
HOST    _dmarc.namigreatercleveland.org
VALUE    v=DMARC1;p=none;

For specific instructions on how to enable DKIM or DMARC for your domain, please contact your domain registrar or email service provider.

Once you have added those DKIM records, please let us know so we can check and finish the validation - they won't work until we verify them. You can just reply back to this email, and I can verify them. Please note that propagation could take up to 48 hours after adding the records in your DNS.

I'll be keeping an eye on this ticket and try to respond to any updates as soon as possible.
Thanks!



Colin Marshall [he, him, his]
Customer Support Specialist
Bloomerang


--------------- Original Message ---------------
From: Katie Jenkins [kjenkins@namicleveland.org<mailto:kjenkins@namicleveland.org>]
Sent: 10/29/2024 1:17 PM
To: support@bloomerang.com<mailto:support@bloomerang.com>
Subject: DKIM

Hello! I would like to add a DKIM record to my bloomerang


Katie Jenkins, LMSW, MPA

Hello Katie, 

Thank you for contacting Support! I hope you're doing well.

I'll be happy to help. Just take the following steps, and then let me know once they're completed. I can then verify them on my end, and give you the all-clear.

It looks like you're sending from the namigreatercleveland.org domain. I took a look, and it seems like your current spf record is the following: 
 
v=spf1 a include:_spf.elasticemail.com ~all

You'll need to edit the spf record to include the following include statement:
include:sendgrid.net

It looks like your DNS is CloudFlare. You can find the guide to their DNS here: https://www.mail-tester.com/spf/cloudflare
Our overall guide to editing the SPF record can be found here: https://support.bloomerang.co/s/article/5000637586#Add_SPF

You can check if your SPF record is set up correctly or if it has errors here: https://mxtoolbox.com/SuperTool.aspx
Just type in your domain, then click the orange dropdown button and choose SPF record Lookup


Regarding DKIM, I have the CNAME records for you here. You'll want to use the following codes:

For specific instructions on how to enable DKIM or DMARC for your domain, please contact your domain registrar or email service provider.

Once you have added those DKIM records, please let us know so we can check and finish the validation - they won't work until we verify them. You can just reply back to this email, and I can verify them. Please note that propagation could take up to 48 hours after adding the records in your DNS.

description:
New Job Submission
		There is a new job submission:
Does this job require a license as opposed to a certificate? If so, we cannot post your job. NoPlease Post Your JobCompany or Organization Cognito, LLCLocation Houston, TexasYour Name Erin ClarksonYour Email 
<mailto:estanton@plan-sys.com>
estanton@plan-sys.comYour Phone (703) 933-1328Job Title Behavioral Health TechnicianJob Description Overview

Cognito LLC a Planned Systems International (PSI) joint venture, is seeking a Behavioral Health Technician to support the ICE Health Services Corps (IHSC) in Houston, Texas. 


As a civilian contractor working for Cognito, you will utilize your abilities as a Behavioral Health Technician to provide the safe delivery of high-quality health care to those in ICE custody. 


Be a Part of the Team: Cognito, is a Mentor-Protégé Joint Venture between QuarterLine Consulting Services and Resolution Think. Cognito is completely committed to providing high-quality service to our customers and to delivering world-class healthcare. 

The Benefits: Our team offers competitive compensation packages, a full range of benefits, continuing education, and excellent work-life balance to ensure your success.


Type of Work: Full Time

Location: Houston, Texas


Essential Functions and Job Responsibilities

The ICE Health Services Corps (IHSC) exists within the organizational structure of the United States Immigration and Customs Enforcement (ICE), Enforcement and Removal Operations (ERO) under the supervision of the Department of Homeland Security (DHS). The United States Public Health Service (USPHS) Commissioned Corps Officers, civil service staff and contractors comprise the healthcare professionals working together to provide quality healthcare services. IHSC serves as the medical experts for ICE for detainee health care.



The Behavioral Health Technician (BHT) provides comprehensive mental health screenings, patient care management and facilitates basic psycho-educational groups. BHT augments on-site behavioral services to include patient education, segregation wellness checks, sleep checks, behavioral observations, and compliance coaching for medical and mental health patients. The BHT consults with Behavioral Health Provider (BHP) to monitor patient compliance, promote safety and patient engagement within an integrated and therapeutic care milieu. BHT schedules appointments, complete medical records documentation in electronic Health Records (eHR) and coordinates follow up care for mental health patients under the direction of the BHP.


Minimum Requirements

Degree: Associates degree in a behavioral science/speciality field. 

Certification:

American Association of Psychiatric Technicians (AAPT) certification at level three within 12 months of hire. 

Maintains current BLS for Provider through American Heart Association or American Red Cross

Experience: Two years of work experience in a mental health clinic or residential healthcare setting.

Credentialing: Ability to pass background check and drug screen. Current physical and immunizations.


Company Benefits

PSI offers full-time, benefits eligible employees a competitive total compensation package that includes paid leave, and options for employer sponsored group medical, dental, vision, short-term and long-term disability, life insurance, AD&D coverage, legal services, identity theft, and accident insurance. Flexible spending account and health saving account options offer pre-tax savings for qualified medical, dental, and vision expenses. The company sponsored 401(k) retirement plan has an employer contribution match that is immediately vested. We invest in the professional growth of our employees through professional courses, certifications, and tuition reimbursement programs.


EEO Commitment

It is company policy to promote equal employment opportunities. All personnel decisions, including, but not limited to, recruiting, hiring, training, promotion, compensation, benefits, and termination, are made without regard to race, color, religion, age, sex, sexual orientation, pregnancy, gender identity, genetic information, national origin, citizenship status, veteran status, protected veteran status, disability, or any other characteristic protected by applicable federal, state, or local law.


Reasonable accommodations for applicants and employees with disabilities will be provided. If a reasonable accommodation is needed to participate in the job application or interview process, to perform essential job functions, and/or to receive other benefits and privileges of employment, please contact Human Resources by emailing HRDepartment@plan-sys.com, or by dialing 703-575-8400.How to Apply Instructions for Applicant Applications can be submitted utilizing the link below: 


https://careers-plansys.icims.com/jobs/10874/behavioral-health-technician/job


OR 


Individuals may email their resume/CV to estanton@plan-sys.comCompany logo 

<https://psychtechs.org/index.php?gf-download=2024%2F10%2FQL-Logo2.jpg&form-id=15&field-id=6&hash=c68706023cbf4c7b75e20000b51f043613f30a40c7a49c2ad5d0568aab73e315>
QL-Logo2.jpg
subject: New Job Submission
description_html:

Does this job require a license as opposed to a certificate? If so, we cannot post your job.

Job Title

Job Description
  Overview
Cognito LLC a Planned Systems International (PSI) joint venture, is seeking a Behavioral Health Technician to support the ICE Health Services Corps (IHSC) in Houston, Texas.

As a civilian contractor working for Cognito, you will utilize your abilities as a Behavioral Health Technician to provide the safe delivery of high-quality health care to those in ICE custody.

Be a Part of the Team: Cognito, is a Mentor-Protégé Joint Venture between QuarterLine Consulting Services and Resolution Think. Cognito is completely committed to providing high-quality service to our customers and to delivering world-class healthcare.
The Benefits: Our team offers competitive compensation packages, a full range of benefits, continuing education, and excellent work-life balance to ensure your success.

Location: Houston, Texas

Essential Functions and Job Responsibilities
The ICE Health Services Corps (IHSC) exists within the organizational structure of the United States Immigration and Customs Enforcement (ICE), Enforcement and Removal Operations (ERO) under the supervision of the Department of Homeland Security (DHS). The United States Public Health Service (USPHS) Commissioned Corps Officers, civil service staff and contractors comprise the healthcare professionals working together to provide quality healthcare services. IHSC serves as the medical experts for ICE for detainee health care.


The Behavioral Health Technician (BHT) provides comprehensive mental health screenings, patient care management and facilitates basic psycho-educational groups. BHT augments on-site behavioral services to include patient education, segregation wellness checks, sleep checks, behavioral observations, and compliance coaching for medical and mental health patients. The BHT consults with Behavioral Health Provider (BHP) to monitor patient compliance, promote safety and patient engagement within an integrated and therapeutic care milieu. BHT schedules appointments, complete medical records documentation in electronic Health Records (eHR) and coordinates follow up care for mental health patients under the direction of the BHP.

American Association of Psychiatric Technicians (AAPT) certification at level three within 12 months of hire.
Maintains current BLS for Provider through American Heart Association or American Red Cross

PSI offers full-time, benefits eligible employees a competitive total compensation package that includes paid leave, and options for employer sponsored group medical, dental, vision, short-term and long-term disability, life insurance, AD&D coverage, legal services, identity theft, and accident insurance. The company sponsored 401(k) retirement plan has an employer contribution match that is immediately vested. https://careers-plansys.icims.com/jobs/10874/behavioral-health-technician/job

description: Good Afternoon,     I am working on creating registration forms for upcoming events. I have created a general form for sponsors for events so we can use it for every event. I was wondering if you recommend using the same generic form or if I should copy the form so that each event has its own specific registration form. I do not know the pros or cons of each option.     Thank you,  Lauren
subject: Creating Forms
description_html:
Good Afternoon,

I am working on creating registration forms for upcoming events. I have created a general form for sponsors for events so we can use it for every event. I was wondering if you recommend using the same generic form or if I should copy the form so that each event has its own specific registration form. I do not know the pros or cons of each option.

Thank you,
Lauren

description: Cant receive email and I need to link my email to cloud flare.      Please help!!
subject: DNS Server
description_html:
Cant receive email and I need to link my email to cloud flare. 

Please help!!

description:
Hi all!  We are going to be moving in the coming months to sending email communications through our new CRM, Bloomerang.  I am looking into how to ensure things do not go to Spam, and found these directions.

https://support.bloomerang.co/s/article/5000637586

I did the first few steps and our SPF is good, but am not sure about the DKIM.  Are you able provide support for Step 4?


Katie Jenkins, LMSW, MPA
she/her
Executive Director
NAMI Greater Cleveland
4415 Euclid Ave., Suite 203
Cleveland, Ohio 44103
Business: (216)875-0266
Helpline: (216)875-7776
Fax: (216)861-2574

www.namigreatercleveland.org<http://www.namigreatercleveland.org/>

[Facebook icon]<https://www.facebook.com/namigreatercleveland/> [LinkedIn icon] <https://www.linkedin.com/company/3321636/admin/>  [Twitter icon] <https://twitter.com/NAMIGRTCL>  [Instagram icon] <https://www.instagram.com/nami_gc/?hl=en>

NAMI Greater Cleveland has moved! You can find us at 4415 Euclid Avenue, Suite 203, Cleveland, Ohio 44103.  All phone numbers will remain the same.

description:
Hello All,

We at NAMI Northern Virginia are striving to serve our community better. We
are aware that the Monday Night Connection Recovery Support Group, that
meets in Fairfax, has a large group of participants and attendees. We would
appreciate it if you'd be willing to share your feedback with us, so we can
create the best experience for you all. Please help us out by answering the
questions on the linked survey
<https://docs.google.com/forms/d/1rC_dgkgni2jXCUp5VkOCbt3CtkLRoceawpnImyjNGII/edit>.


All the best,
NAMI Northern Virginia Programs Team

Oakton, VA 22124

Peer to Peer Harrisburg - 1323 N Front St, Harrisburg, Pa Tuesday, November 12 at 6:00 PM

Also is there a way to cut off registration 2 weeks after the start date? At that point sign up to a waitlist.

Best Regards,


April Downing, MBA

P: 717.233.1164

description:
Hello,
My name is Esther, the adult and family programs manager at NAMI Northern
Virginia.
I'm reaching out to you because you may have participated in one or more
NAMI programs we offer in the Northern Virginia community.

This year, we are celebrating our volunteers and their effort to
lead/facilitate/present NAMI programs to share their experiences, offer
support, educate and advocate for other peers, family members and the
community.

What I'm asking you today is to help us thank our volunteers by
sharing* positive
words, testimonials, or other feedback on how one (or more!) of our
volunteer program leaders' support has impacted you as a peer, family
member or as community member. Click this google form to share your
feedback -  <http://goog_962943075/>*https://forms.gle/Ck6eJ9iPcic3NxDZA

The feedback can be shared anonymously or if you are comfortable, feel free
to share your first name or full name.

Please don't hesitate to reach out to us if you have any questions or
concerns,
Thank you.

Esther Lee
NAMI Northern Virginia Programs Team

NAMI Northern Virginia
PO Box 480
Oakton, VA 22124
HelpLine: 571-458-7310 x 102
volunteer@nami-nova.org
NAMI-NorthernVirginia.org

-- 


*https://nami-northernvirginia.org/get-involved/donate/ 
<https://nami-northernvirginia.org/get-involved/donate/>*
subject: Help NAMI Northern Virginia thank our volunteers!
description_html:
Hello,
My name is Esther, the adult and family programs manager at NAMI Northern Virginia.
I'm reaching out to you because you may have participated in one or more NAMI programs we offer in the Northern Virginia community.

This year, we are celebrating our volunteers and their effort to lead/facilitate/present NAMI programs to share their experiences, offer support, educate and advocate for other peers, family members and the community.

What I'm asking you today is to help us thank our volunteers by sharing positive words, testimonials, or other feedback on how one (or more!) of our volunteer program leaders' support has impacted you as a peer, family member or as community member. Click this google form to share your feedback - https://forms.gle/Ck6eJ9iPcic3NxDZA

The feedback can be shared anonymously or if you are comfortable, feel free to share your first name or full name. 

Please don't hesitate to reach out to us if you have any questions or concerns,
Thank you.

Esther Lee
NAMI Northern Virginia Programs Team

NAMI Northern Virginia
PO Box 480
Oakton, VA 22124
HelpLine: 571-458-7310 x 102
volunteer@nami-nova.org
NAMI-NorthernVirginia.org


https://nami-northernvirginia.org/get-involved/donate/

description:
Dear Jacy and Jocelyn,

It was brought to our attention that when you type in the zip code 08854 to
search the interactive map, there is an extra button that hovers over the
state office star icon, bringing you to NAMI Essex/Passaic, when the county
is designated as NAMI Middlesex. Please let me know if it can be removed or
re-linked with the correct information listed (please see screenshot
below). Thanks!

[image: Screen Shot 2024-10-28 at 12.16.10 PM.png]

-- 
Stephanie Har
Marketing and Communications Director
NAMI New Jersey
1562 Route 130, North Brunswick, NJ 08902
732-940-0991 ext. 111

*Visit **www.namiwalks.org/newjersey* <http://www.namiwalks.org/newjersey>* to
join!*
subject: Interactive Map - Extra Button
description_html:
Dear Jacy and Jocelyn,

It was brought to our attention that when you type in the zip code 08854 to search the interactive map, there is an extra button that hovers over the state office star icon, bringing you to NAMI Essex/Passaic, when the county is designated as NAMI Middlesex. Please let me know if it can be removed or re-linked with the correct information listed (please see screenshot below). Thanks!



--
Stephanie Har
Marketing and Communications Director
NAMI New Jersey
1562 Route 130, North Brunswick, NJ 08902
732-940-0991 ext. 111

Visit www.namiwalks.org/newjersey to join!

description: Hi there,     Our form for our upcoming event works sometimes and doesn't work other times. Sometimes we get submissions with no payment information and sometimes we do. Can you help us so every time someone submits, they are taken to the payment page?
subject: Form Issue
description_html:
Hi there,

Our form for our upcoming event works sometimes and doesn't work other times. Sometimes we get submissions with no payment information and sometimes we do. Can you help us so every time someone submits, they are taken to the payment page?

I have successfully done this on the Homepage Post module.  I haven't been able to do this on the News page or from the Recent Posts side bar.     https://namiacm.org/news/  shows the most recent post which currently is a category of Service Tribute.     https://namiacm.org/my-life-with-ocd/  (Recent News Sidebar)

I created a new post category, Service Tribute.  I want to exclude all Service Tribute posts from being displayed in the News Events and Blogs pages, including the Recent Posts side bar.

I have successfully done this on the Homepage Post module.  I haven't been able to do this on the News page or from the Recent Posts side bar.

https://namiacm.org/news/  shows the most recent post which currently is a category of Service Tribute.

https://namiacm.org/my-life-with-ocd/  (Recent News Sidebar)

description: Hi -      My name is Becca Boston. I'm the Youth and Young Adult Program Coordinator for NAMI Pierce County here in Washington state. I've recently taken on the task of updating our website. I think I've got some of the things down, but I'm having challenges with getting the homepage in the way our Executive Director would like it.      We are hoping to have our home page be similar to NAMI Thurston Mason, which here is their website to reference https://namitm.org/ . Is there a chance someone could walk me through how to do this or even do it for us?      Appreciate all that you do and look forward to hearing from you.
subject: Home Page Design
description_html:
Hi - 

My name is Becca Boston. I'm the Youth and Young Adult Program Coordinator for NAMI Pierce County here in Washington state. I've recently taken on the task of updating our website. I think I've got some of the things down, but I'm having challenges with getting the homepage in the way our Executive Director would like it. 

We are hoping to have our home page be similar to NAMI Thurston Mason, which here is their website to reference https://namitm.org/ . Is there a chance someone could walk me through how to do this or even do it for us? 

Appreciate all that you do and look forward to hearing from you.

description:
Hi Jayce,

I wanted to make the introduction for the UX expert that I have worked with
for complex Wordpress CMS projects for many years. Loren is the founder of
Brightbase and works with some of the best UX in the business.

I counted on him for many years in my marketing and tech background to help
us lift really big projects and have always been very pleased with him and
his team as collaborators and for top quality work.


I will let Loren do further intros and let y’all take it from here. Let me
know if you have any questions,Jayce.

*"Work is love made visible." *

Casey Munck
Programs Manager
NAMI Central Oregon
E: programs@namicentraloregon.org
W: namicentraloregon.org  <http://namicentraloregon.org>
P: ‪(541) 316-0167‬

*We are a 501c3 non-profit organization funded solely by local donations.* To
make a donation to support our work in the community, click here.
<https://secure.lglforms.com/form_engine/s/2eLVOrDveh-Wqt5ezhhj3Q>

I wanted to make the introduction for the UX expert that I have worked with for complex Wordpress CMS projects for many years. Loren is the founder of Brightbase and works with some of the best UX in the business. 

I counted on him for many years in my marketing and tech background to help us lift really big projects and have always been very pleased with him and his team as collaborators and for top quality work.


I will let Loren do further intros and let y’all take it from here. Let me know if you have any questions,Jayce.

description: Hi, I'm reporting on behalf of Katie Harper, Executive Director, NAMI SWOH. Katie reported to me this evening an anomaly with sharing website links in text via a Safari mobile browser on her iPhone. Regardless of the link she shares, the accompanying photo is sourced from a post in the News and Events section of the homepage (Specifically, the article "My Life with OCD."). I've attached a PDF of our text session which includes a screenshot  she sent me as a sample. When texting with another iPhone user, she reports that the receiver also sees this picture with the link to the website. Testing with my Pixel (Android), I do not receive the link with the photo. I can also send via Chrome on my phone without the photo appearing on my end or on the receiving iPhone. The end result is that she would like a photo or a title that represents the page of which she is sharing the link. She is dissatisfied that this photo appears everytime she shares any website link via Safari. Could you please investigate this anomaly?
subject: Sharing webpage links in text
description_html: Hi, I'm reporting on behalf of Katie Harper, Executive Director, NAMI SWOH. Katie reported to me this evening an anomaly with sharing website links in text via a Safari mobile browser on her iPhone. Regardless of the link she shares, the accompanying photo is sourced from a post in the News and Events section of the homepage (Specifically, the article "My Life with OCD."). I've attached a PDF of our text session which includes a screenshot  she sent me as a sample. When texting with another iPhone user, she reports that the receiver also sees this picture with the link to the website. Testing with my Pixel (Android), I do not receive the link with the photo. I can also send via Chrome on my phone without the photo appearing on my end or on the receiving iPhone. The end result is that she would like a photo or a title that represents the page of which she is sharing the link. She is dissatisfied that this photo appears everytime she shares any website link via Safari. Could you please investigate this anomaly?
